item.description:
Freedom Is Fundamental will be discussing Wired Magazine's article "The NSA is Building the Country's Biggest Spy Center (Watch What You Say)".  We will discuss the origins and purpose of the National Security Agency and review the criticism of the Wired Magazine article by NSA chief General Keith Alexander.

A list of hundreds of words to be avoided online - which was released through a Freedom of Information Request -  from the Department of Homeland Security 2011 "Analyst's Desktop Binder" will be available at the meeting.

The article to be discussed is available in the March Issue of Wired Magazine and online here:

http://www.wired.com/threatlevel/2012/03/ff_nsadatacenter/all/1

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: What is the NSA? And Why Do They Care What I Say?
